title: Collateral Damage
description: No longer available. Removed from AFF in 2012.M/m slash, WIP.18-year old Talya was supposed to spend a quiet life practicing meditation in a temple, but when Commander Micah, heading an invasion force, takes him as a war captive to provide personal services for himself and his lieutenents, Talya becomes collateral damage. Can Talya survive Micah's casual cruelty to become more than a bed slave?
author: DrkDreamer
